TokenVesting.fundVesting (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4a5cc3ddbd34933e1ee7fd98ab8189577d7151f.sol#204-214) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,address(this),totalTokens) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4a5cc3ddbd34933e1ee7fd98ab8189577d7151f.sol#211-213)

TokenVesting.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4a5cc3ddbd34933e1ee7fd98ab8189577d7151f.sol#226-247) does not use the value returned by external calls:
